short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension extending Bitbucket's interface with useful features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitbucket's user interface for Pull Requests lacks certain features that the Bitbaguette browser extension adds:

* Restrict maximum display size of embedded screenshots, so that the layout of the PR description and comment threads do not get destroyed anymore
* Allow to collapse (partial) comments
* Provide overview of number of replies and number of linked tasks for each comment (sub-)thread
* Provide a image comparison tool whenever raw image files are modified within the PR
